com.psddev.cms.db

Class ImageTag.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.cms.db.ImageTag.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ImageTag

    public static final class ImageTag.Builder
extends Object

    Static utility class for building HTML 'img' tags and URLs edited by an ImageEditor. This class is functionally equivalent to calling the JSTL <cms:img> tag in your JSP code. Example usage:

     StorageItem myStorageItem;

 String imageTagHtml = new ImageTag.Builder(myStorageItem)
      .setWidth(300)
      .setHeight(200)
      .addAttribute("class", "thumbnail")
      .addAttribute("alt", "My image")
      .toHtml();
    You can also grab just the image URL instead of the entire HTML output by calling: 
     String imageUrl = new ImageTag.Builder(myStorageItem)
      .setWidth(300)
      .setHeight(200)
      .toUrl()

      • setSrcAttribute

        public ImageTag.Builder setSrcAttribute(String srcAttribute)
        Overrides the default attribute (src) used to place the image URL. This is usually used in the conjunction with lazy loading scripts that copy the image URL from this attribute to the "src" attribute at some point after the page has loaded.

      • hideDimensions

        public ImageTag.Builder hideDimensions()
        Set to true if the resulting image dimensions should be removed from the final tag output.
